detail_desc: Maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
Short cycling shorts in stretch jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.

Short skirt in seersucker made from a viscose blend with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam front and back to create a draped effect and two tiers of asymmetric flounces at the hem. Lined.

Short skirt in seersucker made from a viscose blend with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam front and back to create a draped effect and two tiers of asymmetric flounces at the hem. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with a round neckline. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Wide-fitting jumper in a soft, fine-knit alpaca and wool blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, slightly crinkled jersey. Straight cut at the top with a small frill trim, gentle draping over the bust and narrow shoulder straps with a bow. Lined bust. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft alpaca and wool knit with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jumper in a soft alpaca and wool knit with a ribbed polo neck. Relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Ankle-length kaftan in a sturdy jacquard weave with wide stripes in shimmering metallic thread. V-neck, short sleeves with a wide flounce, and slits in the sides.
Necklace in fabric cord with pendants in plexiglass and metal. Adjustable length 35-43 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.

Parka in cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Lined hood, a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets, diagonal, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Adjustable tab and press stud at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Fitted, cropped top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, and an elastic hem with a text print.
Fitted, cropped top in cotton jersey with long sleeves, and an elastic hem with a text print.

Short, airy lace dress with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Short, airy lace dress with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length jumpsuit in imitation leather with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves with turn-ups. Seam with narrow elastication and a wide tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets lined in recycled polyester, and wide, straight legs.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, chunky knit with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the opening. Low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, chunky knit with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the opening. Low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, chunky knit with a deep V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the opening. Low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ballet shoes in shimmering metallic fabric. Wide elastic gore at the top and narrow elastication around the opening. Woven fabric linings and insoles and suede soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly deeper neckline.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in block-coloured jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Matching, block-coloured shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a detachable shoulder strap, two compartments with a zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Recycled polyester lining. Length 21 cm. Height 14 cm.
Briefs in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, sewn-on bow at the front and lined gusset.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, small bow at the front and lined gusset.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton and recycled polyester blend with a ribbed collar and button band with matt press-studs down the front. Open chest pocket.
Cardigan in a fine-knit cotton and recycled polyester blend with a ribbed collar and button band with matt press-studs down the front. Open chest pocket.
Loafers in imitation leather. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 2 cm.
Loafers in imitation leather. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 2 cm.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hair clips in metal decorated with both real and plastic shells. Length 6 cm.
Hair elastics with metal decorations.
Baby Exclusive. Helmet hat in a woven wool blend with a brushed finish. Narrow ties and a soft jersey lining. The polyester content of the hat is recycled.
Plastic box in the shape of a flower containing beads in various designs including letter beads, and elastic thread in six different colours.
A pair of earrings in textured metal. Length 4.5 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
A pair of earrings in textured metal. Length 4.5 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.

Ankle-length joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the hems.

Ankle-length joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and covered elastication at the hems.
A pair of large hoop earrings in textured metal. Diameter 7 cm. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Sandals with glittery straps in woven fabric. Hook and loop fasteners and a small platform. Textured insoles and soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Sandals with glittery straps in woven fabric. Hook and loop fasteners and a small platform. Textured insoles and soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in lightweight jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short elasticated plastic necklaces.
Metal anklets in different designs. Adjustable length 22-25 cm.
Metal anklets in different designs. Adjustable length 22-25 cm.

Short, straight-cut tunic in soft, washed denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton blend. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, button placket and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Full-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front for width in the legs. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and concealed pockets in the side seams. The polyester content of the pocket lining is recycled.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge, padded tongue and lacing at the front. Contrasting colour details in imitation suede at the heels and toes, and a print motif on the tongue and one side. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles with a patterned underneath for a good grip. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.

Trainers in imitation leather with a padded top edge, padded tongue and lacing at the front. Contrasting colour details in imitation suede at the heels and toes, and a print motif on the tongue and one side. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles with a patterned underneath for a good grip. The polyester content of the trainers is partly recycled.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies. Diameter 4 cm.
Calf-length A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed neckline and narrow shoulder straps. A seam below the hips and at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Calf-length A-line dress in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed neckline and narrow shoulder straps. A seam below the hips and at the hem for added volume. Unlined.
Knee-length sports shorts in woven fabric with elastication and an inner drawstring at the waist and discreet side pockets.
Metal hoop earrings with a pendant in the shape of a snake with rhinestone eyes. Length 5 cm.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a small pendant. Adjustable length approx. 42-51 cm.
Metal studs in various sizes and designs.
